tag_list: finanancing-green-conscience, retail-hybrid, bridging-the-gaps, entepreneur, visionary, trendsetter, lenard-kritchman
overview: This person is a Visionary Entrepreneur & Trendsetter. Property in Costa Rica before it was the place. Owned 2 Natural Food Stores & Cafes in Hawaii before it was over run. Have a Business Plan that will help Millions and enter markets with yearly revenues in the Billions. Formed a pyrimid management for rapid growth. Full knowledge of P.O.S. Systems and integrating Accounting software with the system. Learned by my mistakes at 45 and ready for act 2 my accumulated knowledge is a must. We can never have a healthy Economy without a healthy Environment. The missing link. I have always been a bridge, connecting people from one decade to each other.
